BodRawD328.Transcription: That the hert þynkytthe mowte spekyt
BodRawD328.Note:
Translating ‘Quod cor subcelat nam lingua sepe
                    reuelat’, which precedes; English portion all written on one
                    line.
BodRawD328.Editions:
Meech,  Sanford Brown. 
             “A Collection of Proverbs in Rawlinson MS D 328.” 
             Modern Philology
         38 (1940-41): 113-32: 119.
